summary: An impassive young girl is taken from her suicidal London life, back to her home in North England, on a bizarre bus trip. Seen through the poetic eye of the camera, this is a commentary of doomed British morbidity.
cast: Patricia Healey|Arthur Lowe|John Sharp|Julie Perry|Stephen Moore|Victor Henry|John Savident|Fanny Carby|Malcolm Taylor|Allan O'Keefe|Anthony Hopkins|Jeanne Watts|Eddie King|Barry Evans|Penny Ryder|Dennis Alaba Peters|Abdul Rahman Akim|Margaret Barron|Jay Birje-Patil|Cecil H. keywords: young woman|title written by female|female protagonist|women's role in society|secretarial typing pool
title: The White Bus
